#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}
shared_ptr<IntEvent> 


RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                            siteid_t site_id,
                            RequestVoteInp inp,
                            RequestVoteRet* ret) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [ret, &ev](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu -> get_reply() >> ret -> term >> ret -> requestGranted;
        if (ev && ev.get() && ev -> status_ == Event::WAIT)
          ev -> Set(1);
        /* process the RPC response here */
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, inp.term, inp.candidateId, 
                inp.lastLogIndex, inp.lastLogTerm, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 


RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                              siteid_t site_id,
                              AppendEntriesInp inp, 
                              AppendEntriesRet* ret) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  Log_info("Event Address:  %p",ev.get());
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [site_id, ret, &ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> ret -> term >> ret -> success;
       if (ev && ev.get() && ev -> status_ == Event::WAIT){
          ev -> Set(1);
       }
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      vector<MarshallDeputy> cmd_md;
      for (auto in: inp.entries.cmd) {
        MarshallDeputy md(in);
        cmd_md.push_back(md);
      }
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, inp.term, inp.leaderId, inp.leaderCommit, 
                cmd_md, inp.entries.term, inp.prevLogIndex, inp.prevLogTerm, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {


      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        uint64_t ret;
        fu->get_reply() >> ret >> *res;
        cout << ret <<" " << *res << endl;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

} // namespace janus
